description.en: A rotation that attempts to use the "confirmed not bug" mechanic that during the queue window of Heroic Strike / Cleave the dual-wield hit penalty does not apply.
description.zh: 双持狂暴战输出循环，卡英勇/顺劈斩使双持命中惩罚无效

cast_if.name: Battle Shout
cast_if.en: buff_duration "Battle Shout" less 3 or variable "time_remaining_execute" less 10 and variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 0 and buff_duration "Battle Shout" less 45
cast_if.zh: buff_duration "战斗怒吼" less 3 or variable "time_remaining_execute" less 10 and variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 0 and buff_duration "战斗怒吼" less 45

cast_if.name: Heroic Strike
cast_if.en: variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 3 and resource "Rage" greater 30 and buff_duration "Overpower" greater 3 and buff_duration "Battle Stance" is false and spell "Mainhand Attack" less 1.5
cast_if.zh: variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 3 and resource "Rage" greater 30 and buff_duration "压制" greater 3 and buff_duration "战斗姿态" is false and spell "主手攻击" less 1.5

cast_if.name: Death Wish
cast_if.en: variable "time_remaining_encounter" less 33 or variable "time_remaining_execute" less 3 or variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 180

cast_if.name: Blood Fury
cast_if.en: variable "time_remaining_execute" less 0 and resource "Rage" less 50 or variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 120

cast_if.name: Berserking
cast_if.en: variable "time_remaining_execute" less 0 and resource "Rage" less 50 or variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 180

cast_if.name: Whirlwind
cast_if.zh: spell "嗜血" greater 1.5 and variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 0

cast_if.name: Hamstring
cast_if.en: spell "Bloodthirst" greater 1.5 and variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 0 and buff_duration "Overpower" is false and resource "Rage" greater 80
cast_if.zh: spell "嗜血" greater 1.5 and variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 0 and buff_duration "压制" is false and resource "Rage" greater 80

cast_if.name: Battle Stance
cast_if.en: variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 5 and buff_duration "Overpower" greater 2 and spell "Bloodthirst" greater 3 and resource "Rage" less 50
cast_if.zh: variable "time_remaining_execute" greater 5 and buff_duration "压制" greater 2 and spell "嗜血" greater 3 and resource "Rage" less 50

cast_if.name: Berserker Stance
cast_if.en: variable "time_remaining_execute" less 0 or buff_duration "Overpower" is false
cast_if.zh: variable "time_remaining_execute" less 0 or buff_duration "压制" is false
